author: Kate Mayberry
title: More than two million confirmed with coronavirus: Live updates
description: Number of dead in New York state exceeds 10,000 as Trump tries to defend his coronavirus response.
content:
Hello and welcome to Al Jazeera's continuing coverage of the coronavirus pandemic.
I'm Kate Mayberry in Kuala Lumpur.
A summary of the latest developments:
<ul><li>More than two million people around the world have now been confirmed to have the new corona… [+3434 chars]
